Job1

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • Job1.Parser

  • public class Parser
extends Object
    This class is used to extract Information from a tweet, which is needed for the map-reduce in Job1
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Jeremy, Selen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Parser()
      Constructor which reads stopwords lists in so they can be used instantly.

      • getDate

        public String getDate(org.json.simple.JSONObject tweet)
               throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Gets the date where the tweet is created
        Parameters:
        tweet - the JSONObject that is exactly one tweet
        Returns:
        Month + Day + Year
        Throws:
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - If a parse Exception occurred

      • getLanguage

        public String getLanguage(org.json.simple.JSONObject tweet)
                   throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Extracts the machine determined language of exactly one tweet
        Parameters:
        tweet - the JSONObject that is exactly one tweet
        Returns:
        String which has the ISO-639-1 coding for a language
        Throws:
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - If a parse Exception occurred

      • getHashtags

        public LinkedList<String> getHashtags(org.json.simple.JSONObject tweet)
                               throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Extracts the hashtags from exactly one tweet
        Parameters:
        tweet - the JSONObject that is exactly one tweet
        Returns:
        hashtagList List which contains all hashtags
        Throws:
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - If a parse Exception occurred

      • getText

        public LinkedList<String> getText(org.json.simple.JSONObject tweet)
                           throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Extracts the actual text from exactly one tweet, during this only useful words will be extracted. All words will be in lower Case
        Parameters:
        tweet - the JSONObject that is exactly one tweet
        Returns:
        textList List which contains all useful words from the original text
        Throws:
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - If a parse Exception occurred

      • removeAllStopWords

        public String removeAllStopWords(String text)
        Removes all stopwords @{https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stop_word)} from a String
        Parameters:
        text - String which is a tweet-text
        Returns:
        result original string without stopwords
